metadata.title: CVE-2022-34503 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: QPDF v8.4.2 was discovered to contain a heap buffer overflow via thefunction QPDF::processXRefStream. This vulnerability allows attackers tocause a Denial of Service (DoS) via a crafted PDF file.

criterions.comment: qpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
